alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 28 at 2:59AM EST until November 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Coastal Brunswick, Coastal New Hanover, Coastal Pender, and Inland New Hanover Counties. In South Carolina, Coastal Georgetown and Coastal Horry Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover
